title: Ep55: South Notts Hussars - NW Europe Part 1
itunes:title: Ep55: South Notts Hussars - NW Europe Part 1
itunes:subtitle: In the first episode of the RELAUNCHED Pete & Gary's Military History, the boys continue the story of the South Notts Hussars, as this WW2 artillery unit fights in North-West Europe. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan...
description:
In the first episode of the RELAUNCHED Pete & Gary's Military History, the boys continue the story of the South Notts Hussars, as this WW2 artillery unit fights in North-West Europe.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Peter Hart's Military History is a Living History production.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
